mapper.sql: id, type, number, user_id, asset_id, address, purpose, start_time, end_time, urgency, remarks, result, image1, image2, image3
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from asset_apply
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into asset_apply (id, type, number, user_id, asset_id, address, purpose, start_time, end_time, urgency, remarks, result, image1, image2, image3 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{assetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{urgency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update asset_apply
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number = #{record.number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
asset_id = #{record.assetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose = #{record.purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
urgency = #{record.urgency,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{record.result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
image1 = #{record.image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image2 = #{record.image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image3 = #{record.image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update asset_apply set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{record.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asset_id = #{record.assetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{record.purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, urgency = #{record.urgency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{record.result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image1 = #{record.image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image2 = #{record.image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image3 = #{record.image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update asset_apply
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
asset_id = #{assetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
urgency = #{urgency,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

image1 = #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image2 = #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image3 = #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update asset_apply set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asset_id = #{assetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, urgency = #{urgency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image1 = #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image2 = #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image3 = #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select aa.type, aa.number,u.user_name userName, aa.asset_id assetId,ai.asset_name assetName,ai.version assetVersion, aa.address, aa.purpose, aa.start_time startTime,aa.end_time endTime,aa.urgency, aa.remarks, aa.result, aa.image1, aa.image2, aa.image3 from asset_apply aa, asset_info ai, user u where aa.user_id = u.id and aa.asset_id = ai.id and aa.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(1) from asset_apply where type = 1
select count(1) from asset_apply where type = 2
select count(1) from asset_apply where type = 5
select count(1) from asset_apply where type = 4
select ai.asset_name assetName, count(1) assetNum from asset_apply aa, asset_info ai where aa.asset_id = ai.id group by ai.asset_name order by assetNum limit 5
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(start_time,"%Y.%m") monthDate, COUNT(1) total FROM asset_apply GROUP BY YEAR(start_time),MONTH(start_time) ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 1,7
